code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./ToggleSwitch.css";import{CurrentTemperatureUnitContext}from"../../contexts/CurrentTemperatureUnitContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToggleSwitch=()=>{const{currentTemperatureUnit,handleToggleSwitchChange}=useContext(CurrentTemperatureUnitContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"switch",onClick:handleToggleSwitchChange,onChange:handleToggleSwitchChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",className:"switch__box"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:currentTemperatureUnit==="F"?"switch__slider switch__slider-F":"switch__slider switch__slider-C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"switch__temp-F ".concat(currentTemperatureUnit==="F"?"switch__active":"switch__none"),children:"F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"switch__temp-C ".concat(currentTemperatureUnit==="C"?"switch__active":"switch__none"),children:"C"})]});};export default ToggleSwitch;
